sections.heading: by parties to arbitration agreement
sections.text: Nothing contained herein shall prevent at any time a written compromise as provided by section 77-3310 by all parties to the agreement made pursuant to section 77-3301, fixing the amounts to be accepted by this and any other state involved in full satisfaction of

77-3308.Compromise by parties to arbitration agreement.

Nothing contained herein shall prevent at any time a written compromise as provided by section 77-3310 by all parties to the agreement made pursuant to section 77-3301, fixing the amounts to be accepted by this and any other state involved in full satisfaction of death taxes.

SourceLaws 1976, LB 584, ยง 8.
